Building a Global Mobile Newsroom in 4 Weeks

100% Platform Agnostic Architecture

Newsroom platformâ€™s 100% API-first headless architecture leads to increased performance, security and sustainable flexibility, now and in the future â€“ for expansion to other platforms such as web and upcoming technology experiences e.g. voice-activated interfaces (e.g. Amazon Alexa), wearables and even connected cars.

Agile, Userâ€“driven Iterations

Working closely with key Volkswagen Group stakeholders, we conceptualized the application prioritizing key user and strategic features for the (almost) impossible deadline.

Based on positive user feedback, the appâ€™s scope was broadened to become the mobile newsroom of Volkswagen Group. The platform now serves journalists worldwide for everything related to Volkswagen Group and its brands and enables Volkswagen Group to foster synergies across brands and markets.
